text: Iván Gutiérrez López (born 16 February 1998) is a footballer who currently plays for LA Galaxy II in the USL Championship. Born in the United States, Gutiérrez represents Mexico internationally. ==Career== After playing four seasons with the academy team of Chivas USA in his native California, Gutiérrez moved to the team's parent club Guadalajara in Mexico. He appeared for both the Chivas Guadalajara Fuerzas Básicas Sub-20 team, scoring 7 goals in 17 appearances, and Guadalajara Premier, where he scored 3 goals in 33 appearances.https://ligamx.net/cancha/jugador/117568/ivan-gutierrez-lopez On 3 June 2019, Gutiérrez joined USL Championship side LA Galaxy II. ==References== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Soccer players from California Category:Mexican footballers Category:Mexico youth international footballers Category:American soccer players Category:American sportspeople of Mexican descent Category:C.D. title: Iván Gutiérrez (soccer)
